item.description:
This is an encore from the Indian dance competition last fall. This show will have different dance styles competing against each other, such as Bhangra vs Bollywood vs Fusion vs Garba/Raas teams...which is the best? Come find out at the South Asian Showdown! The best teams from all over North America will be competing for the South Asian Showdown crown!!

The event is on Feb 12th at 6pm at the John Hancock Hall in Boston. Tickets start at $20 and can be bought on line. If you want to sit with the group, you can pay for your ticket when you RSVP and I will purchase all the tickets together. This way the seats will all be together. You can also purchase tickets yourself but you won't have a seat with the rest of the group. This is the web site for more details about the event: http://www.southasian...

The performance last fall lasted for four hours. I found about two hourse was enough. We can watch part of the show and the go somewhere afterwards, perhaps to an Indian restaurant.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be outside the entrance to the theater at 5:30.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: South Asian Showdown 2011
